name: Staff
summary: A simple tool that provides +1 roll bonus to your {Arcane} actions.
description:
Provides a +1 roll bonus to your {Arcane} actions.

When you perform an {Arcane} action that uses a hand, then you may use the end of this staff as a free hand.

abilities.name: Hit
abilities.description: Hit something with your stick, dealing 3 {Bludgeoning} {Damage}.
